location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to the Right Honourable Lord Amherst, Governor General at Fort William, from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf

physicalDescription.extent: The letter has been struck through in blue pencil.

mods.abstract: The letter is related to financial matters, and concerns two bills of exchange totalling 20,000 Indian rupees.
